title: Herd card
data:
{{obsolete}} The Herd card summons 1d(power/3)+1 animals (minimum 2). Fifty percent of the time will result in only one kind of monster; otherwise it's randomly jumbled. Higher card power reduces the odds of some animals arriving hostile. Possible summons include: *{{LightRed|r}} [[File:Orange rat.png]] [[Orange rat]] *{{LightGrey|Y}} [[File:Sheep.png]] [[Sheep]] *{{Brown|Y}} [[File:Yak.png]] [[Yak]] *{{LightMagenta|h}} [[File:Hog.png]] [[Hog]] *{{White|a}} [[File:Soldier ant.png]] [[Soldier ant]] *{{LightGrey|h}} [[File:Wolf.png]] [[Wolf]] *{{LightBlue|h}} [[File:Polar bear.png]] [[Polar bear]] *{{Blue|h}} [[File:Black bear.png]] [[Black bear]] *{{Magenta|l}} [[File:Basilisk.png]] [[Basilisk]] *{{LightRed|l}} [[File:Komodo dragon.png]] [[Komodo dragon]] *{{Yellow|F}} [[File:Spiny frog.png]] [[Spiny frog]] *{{Yellow|h}} [[File:Hound.png]] [[Hound]] *{{Green|Y}} [[File:Elephant.png]] [[Elephant]] *{{Brown|H}} [[File:Hippogriff.png]] [[Hippogriff]] *{{Yellow|H}} [[File:Griffon.png]] [[Griffon]] ==History== The Herd card could be found in the following [[Decks|decks]] over the past several versions.
